



#!/bin/bash

curl -X POST \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  -H "Authorization: token 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" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/fogadOg/javaSearchEngine/actions/workflows/pushRequest.yml/dispatches \
  -d '{"ref": "main", "inputs": {"filename": ".github/workflows/config.yml", "word_to_replace": "old_word", "new_word": "new_word"}}'


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

GET /repos/fogadOg/javaSearchEngine/actions/workflows
